```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
```
# Chipps
```{r}
chipps <- read.csv("Chipps Island Trawls LFS oct2021-june2022.csv", stringsAsFactors = F)
chipps$SampleDate<-mdy(chipps$SampleDate)
chipps$CatchCount<-as.numeric(chipps$CatchCount)

#filter to >60mm
chipps.ad <- filter(chipps, ForkLength >= 60)

#plot catch over time
ggplot(data=chipps.ad, aes(x=SampleDate, y=CatchCount)) +
    geom_bar(stat="identity") +
    theme_bw() +
    ylab("LFS Catch") +
    xlab("Month") +
    scale_x_date(date_breaks = "1 month", date_labels = "%b")

ggsave("chipps_plot.png", height=4, width=7, units="in")
```
